org.jamsim.ascape.r
Class RLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.jamsim.ascape.r.RLoader

public class RLoader
extends Object

Create an RSwingConsole, load and initialise R, and add the console to the Ascape GUI.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Oliver Mannion

Constructor Detail

RLoader

public RLoader(File startUpFile)
        throws RInterfaceException,
               IOException
Construct with a file to load at R startup.

Parameters:
startUpFile - file of R commands to load into R when it is started, or null if no file to load.
Throws:
RInterfaceException - if problem loading R
IOException - if problem reading startup file
